snippet: The California State University system named a new chief executive on Thursday, Timothy P. White, leader of the University of California, Riverside.
abstract: California State University system names Timothy P White the new chief executive.
lead_paragraph: The California State University system named a new chief executive on Thursday, Timothy P. White, leader of the University of California, Riverside.

headline.main: California: University System Gets New Leader
headline.print_headline: California: University System Gets New Leader
